1:
When Israel left Egypt,\q the house of Jacob from that foreign people,
\q
2:
Judah became his holy place,\q Israel his kingdom.


\q
3:
The sea looked and fled;\q the Jordan turned back.
\q
4:
The mountains skipped like rams,\q the hills skipped like lambs.


\q
5:
Why did you flee, sea?\q Jordan, why did you turn back?
\q
6:
Mountains, why did you skip like rams?\q You little hills, why did you skip like lambs?
\q
7:
Tremble, earth, before the Lord,\q at the presence of the God of Jacob.


\q
8: He turned the rock into a pool of water,\q the hard rock into a spring of water.
